content.rendered:
FINANCE, BUSINESS, IT & ANALYTICS
FBIA™ Solutions
Maximizing profitability
through integrated
FBIA™ Solutions
WHO WE ARE

We are a boutique Finance, Business, IT and Analytics consulting firm. We are comprised of expert Analysts, Data Artists, BI Professionals, IT Professionals, Clinicians, and Strategists possessing specialized skills to take the complex and make it simple. We are a firm that wants to make a positive impact in the communities we serve by using our skillsets, not to just help organizations increase their bottom line, but to address health equity.

Start today
WHAT WE DO

We specialize in Healthcare and IT Solutions. Our methodology integrates 4 pillars; FINANCE, BUSINESS, IT, and ANALYTICS (FBIA™) to ensure our Solutions uncover opportunities, minimize risks, and maximize reimbursement & profitability.  Our clients provide services to the underserved population.  We utilize innovative solutions to provide insights of revenue leakage, opportunities of improvement, and gaps.  We turn disparate data into fact-based information to help guide decision makers.  We create lean processes and systems that reduce waste. The work we do helps organizations that receive Federal/State Funding or Grants achieve maximum reimbursement and positive outcomes.

Request a Meeting
WHY OUR FIRM

What differentiates us from other firms is our unique skillset of experience in FBIA™.  We understand the business, so we can make recommendations and build the tools to get the desired results.  Our team members are experts who have worked for the Big 5, Commercial & Government Payors, Public & Private Providers, Top SOMs, Large Health Systems, Safety Nets, Community Health Systems, Community Mental Health Systems, Non-Profits and many more.  Collectively, there is a vast range of experience our team brings to the table to help our clients.

Start today
OUR APPROACH
We provide a full-service FBIA™ revenue
optimizing experience
Not only do we make recommendations we implement them.

Our approach incorporates the following steps:
Step 1:  Assess current financial position
Step 2:  Identify gaps
Step 3:  Improve processes 
Step 4:  Create tailored solutions

Our experts unlock the full value of your data with a holistic approach that connects

FBIA™
FINANCE    BUSINESS    IT   ANALYTICS

Finance

Revenue Cycle

Medicaid/Medicare Cost Reporting Preparation

Reimbursement

Contract Management

IT

ITaaS

Cloud Services

Software Procurement

Asset Management

IT Security

Data Warehousing

BUSINESS

Strategic Advisory

Training & Development

Managed Services

Culture

ANALYTICS

AaaS

Financial Analysis

Operational Analysis

Regulatory Reporting

Population Health

DATA DRIVEN INNOVATION
HEALTH EQUITY

There are disparities in healthcare as well as access to quality care for underserved populations.  Our work provides the infrastructure and tools to help organizations uncover areas of opportunity.   The healthcare industry is forever evolving, our firm helps position organizations to have the competitive edge and to be proactive by providing them with tailored strategies, processes, systems, and tools.

VALUE-BASED PERFORMANCE

Health care is transitioning from volume-based to value-based performance.  As healthcare organizations are required to reduce costs, provide quality care, integrate care, ensure access, and improve outcomes, they are becoming more data driven.  Our work helps an organization manage, measure, and monitor care by providing infrastructure and strategic insights.

PROVEN METHODOLOGY

Our proven methodology integrates our Finance, Business, IT and Analytic capabilities to unlock insights, drive improvements, reduce costs, and maximize reimbursement.  We leverage tools, platforms, process and procedures to build enterprise-wide data-driven innovative solutions.

Finance

We work with clients to improve their bottom line by identifying revenue leakages and maximizing reimbursement.

Business

We provide strategic advisory consulting to help position companies to have a competitive advantage.

IT

We develop and implement innovative technology infrastructure solutions that addresses evolving industry trends and ensures information reliability.

Analytics

We provide solutions to promote and empower data-driven decisions.

CORE VALUES
Our Core Values guide everything we do
Client Centric

We provide premium service and attention to our clients.

Respect

Be a good human to all humans at all times.

Quality

We deliver our best and hold ourselves accountable.

Social Impact

We are committed to leaving the communities we serve better than we found them.

Collaboration

We leverage the teams’ collective genius. We elevate each other.

Diversity

Different strengths, cultures, experiences, backgrounds, and ideas are what makes us great.

Integrity

We are honest, transparent, ethical, and fair.

Innovation

We bring our authentic selves and have fun creating innovative solutions.

Who we Serve

➤ Community Health Centers
➤ Community Mental Health Centers
➤ Non-Profits
➤ Small Businesses

Although our main focus is healthcare, to help support sustainability in Community Small Businesses, we provide Strategic Planning, AaaS and ITaaS to help small businesses uncover areas of opportunity and maximize their profitability.
Our team

We are healthcare innovators. We use data and analytics to make positive impacts toward health equity. Our team is comprised of senior level experts who are data focused and results driven. Our consultants are our greatest resource, they are lead Analysts, Data Artists, BI Professionals, IT Professionals, Clinicians, and Strategists possessing specialized skills to take the complex and make it simple.

Our team

We are healthcare innovators. We use data and analytics to make positive impacts toward health equity. Our team is comprised of senior level experts who are data focused and results driven. Our consultants are our greatest resource, they are lead Analysts, Data Artists, BI Professionals, IT Professionals, Clinicians, and Strategists possessing specialized skills to take the complex and make it simple.

WE ARE A CERTIFIED ENTERPRISE
CERTIFICATIONS
Twitter Social-facebook Social-linkedin Instagram Youtube

Connect With Us Via Social Networks

    4950 S. Yosemite St.  F2  #211

    Denver, CO 80111

    (303) 884-7733

    info@solutionsfbia.com
